With some crazy backflip stunts, Blackfangs manages to avoid most hits 
but a few ones that went scorching his armor. All the while, he draws 
his bone knife from its scabbard and prepares his move. He stops, 
takes a moment, and leaps directly at Perceptor, trying to drive the 
knife somewhere on the bot.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight/Perceptor::
> 
> Perceptor recieved the hits and shouted "Take this back freaky 
canine"
> Perceptor fire back.
> 
> Nightlight looked around and she din't sure what to do she looked at 
> Waspanator and aimed her laser gun, her arms were tembling, she 
> didn't like hurt or kill anyone but she promised that she would do 
> her best effort, and she shot against Waspanator
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang got hit and flew backward. He quickly got up, though, 
and 
> > soon, he fired 4 blasts of his energy shotgun at Perceptor.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Take that, freaky pred!
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Nightlight/Perceptor:::
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nightlight arrived and she stayed few steps behind Blackfang. 
> > > Perceptor looked evily and say "I'm here to cover my 
> leader... "and 
> > > opened fire against Blackfang
